mutants.code:
def getSum(x, y):
    sum = x | y
    carry = (x & y) << 1
    while carry:
        x = sum
        y = carry
        sum = x ^ y
        carry = (x & y) << 1
    return sum

def getSum(x, y):
    sum = x ^ y
    carry = (x | y) << 1
    while carry:
        x = sum
        y = carry
        sum = x ^ y
        carry = (x & y) << 1
    return sum
